Fuq jekk Alla hux imħabba t-tweġiba qiegħda fil-vers li l-aktar iħobbu jikkwotaw ul-Protestanti meħud mill-vanġelu ta' San Ġwann. John  ' Alla hekk ħabb id-dinja li bagħat lil iben waħdieni tiegħu sabiex kull min jemmen fih ikollu l-ħajja ta' dejjem.' Mela : 1) Alla jħobb id-dinja. 2)  Ġesu' huwa l-iben ta' Alla. 3) Biex temmen f' Ġesu trid isegwi l-Kmandamenti tal-imħabba lejn il-bnedmin u lejn Alla. 4) Min jemmen f' Ġesu' mhux se jkollu ħajja faċli jew xi benefiċċju f'din id-dinja. Xorta se jimrad, jkollu d-dwejjaq, jkollu min jitradih u jabbandunah, xorat se jkun umiljat u mhux garantit xejn sabiħ f'din id-dinja. Iżda garantit li jkollu ħajja ta' dejjem fejn is-sofferenzi u umiljazzjonijiet ta' din id-dinja jkunu saru insinifikanti.
Anzi.. mhemmx bzonn jollu t taxxi. Hekk jifqu ifottu qas hemm bzonn aktar taxxa! Mohhok biex tolli t taxxa
Prosit Mark. Bniedem intelligenti mmens.

Just wrapped up the podcast with Jon and Mark Lawrence—honestly, it hit differently. Real talk, real experience, and none of that empty buzzword nonsense you hear way too often these days. You can tell when people actually know what they’re talking about… and when others are just winging it for clicks. This one raised the bar. They challenged each other believes respectfully with playing the know it all from the Big Bang to Trump polices and anything in between!
Chapeau Jon and Mark Lawrence

Poddata mill-aqwa u verament interessanti li tħeġġeġ iktar ħsieb fil-fond. L-elementi fejn ma qbiltux u li ddiskutejtu għamluhom saħansitra iktar interessanti. It-teoriji li semmejtu huma ta’ min jirrifletti fuqhom, u żiedu saffi oħra ta’ fond mal-poddata. Ovvjament, hemm punti fejn ma naqbilx, bħal pereżempju l-mod kif ġie diskuss l-argument tad-difiża tal-EU, u l-ipoteżi li membru tal- Partit Laburista jkun iktar preparat għal ċerti sfidi għax iħossu inqas sigur jew inqas ‘bravu’ minn membru tal-Partit Nazzjonalista.

Smajt il podcast b attenzjoni kbira u certu dieqa.. Mark Anthony jider tifel genwin, kapaci, ragel tal familja u b valuri tajbin.  Imma sfortunatament jibqa jobzoq l-istess narrativa (u anke certu hdura) li time and time again falliet ghal PN.  Il poplu wera car li mhix strategija tajba u jibqaw bl istess diska.  U fl ahhar ir risultat sfortunatament ha jkun l-istess.  Filwaqt li l-issue primarja li ghandhom, il-leader, tibqa ma tigix indirizzata.
Ghalija Mark Anthony huwa l-unika tama ghal Malta fil-futur. Narah l-uniku denju li jkun Kap tal-PN u Prim Ministru.

Fl 1948 il- UN holqot stati separati ghall Lhud u ghal-Gharab wara li il-lvant nofsani gie liberat mill okkupazzjoni tal imperjalisti Torok permezz tal-Inglizi u l-Francizi, bi tmiem tal ewwel gwerra dinjija WW1 u l kollass tal imperu Ottoman/Tork li kien hakem l-Israel u l-artijet tal lvant nofsani, il-Maghreb, partijiet minn Spanja, Franza u ohrajn fi snin ta invazzjonijiet 800-1200. Fl-1565 ippruvaw jiehdu l-Malta. Dik l-offerta ta' pajjizi ghall etnici diversi giet milqugha mill-Lhud, avolja il-UN ma taghthomx daqs kemm xtaqu, u l-Gharab  ma accejtawx ghax ma riedux li l Lhud jinaghtaw art ghalihom, l-anqas daqs qasrija tal- geranju. L-Gharab immedjatament attakaw l-istat gdid ta Israel saghtejn wara id-dikjarazzjoni tal UN, biex jeqirdu l-istat gdid tal-Izrael u possibilment joqtlu il-Lhud kollha. Il-Leaders Gharab kien supporters ta' Hitler qabel u waqt il WW2 ghal ragunijiet obvji. L Gharab tilfu dik il-gwerra u tkieta ohra warajaha. Issa il-Hamas bdew il-Hames gwerra biex jinqered l-Izrael

My cat is not a specific breed, and needs specialised food. 200EUR a month is a bit of an exaggeration. The food is expensive, however when you divide it by the days it will last you for, it's really not that expensive. He has needed the vet 2 or 3 times in the 11 years we've been together, and vet visits are expensive, but it's not 200eur a month for a lifetime.

The worst issues will be possible damage in the home (same as if you have kids, dogs, etc) and when you go abroad, pet boarding etc is extremely expensive. 

I would say having a dog is a lot more expensive.

Lots of beating around the bush. No explanation as to how the densification of Malta (which he is in favour of) could take place without allowing "pencil developments" in at least some central localities. This was always going to be a necessary evil. At some point all of Malta consisted of 1-2 story buildings. A decision had to be made to densify by raising the building height, and it would not have made sense to raise it by just 1 or 2 floors at a time, only to have to raise it again 10 years later. There's also tons of talk about aesthetics but almost nothing about the economic, functional, and social aspects of development.

Ma nafx f'liema speċjalizzazjoni ipprattika l-liġi Darren, imma ma naħsibx li kien financial services żgur.

Kull min jaħdem fis-settur jaf li Malta hi meqjusa tax haven klassika. Bir-refund ta 5/6s tat-taxxa lura lis-sid, qed nittaxxaw rata effettiva ta 5%.

Mind you, din li qisha xi dawgħa vera ma nistax għalijha. Ehe, we are a tax haven, aiming to attract businesses and the benefits that come with it. And we shouldn't apologise for it.

Just daqs kemm ma kienux tax havens Luxembourg u l-Irlanda, li terġa' kienu iktar oxxeni fl-istil tagħhom, għax innegozjaw discriminately ma corporate giants bhal Amazon u Google u ingħataw rati preferenzjali. U well played to them, frankly. 

Il-boss li kelli jien, Svediz, sinjurun, kellu ċittadinanza Amerikana għax għamel snin jistudja u jaħdem l-Amerika. Fl-aħħar iddenunzja ċ-ċittadinanza Amerika sempliciment biex l-IRS Amerikana ma jkollhiex jurisdiction fuqu (l-Amerikani jintaxxaw on global wealth anywhere worldwide). U terġa' ghal fini ta taxxa, avolja Swedish, tax resident ta Switzerland kien (tistaw timmaġinaw kemm kien residenti Switzerland! But that's how the ultra rich operate). U terġa' naħseb għazel Switzerland għax Swiss private banking laws iżommu ġid f'banek Svizzeri sigrieti iktar jekk resident.

U l-isbaħ ħaġa hi li kollox legali! Irridu naċċettawha, hekk joperaw sinjuri. Għax dik il 5% rata inqas ta taxxa issarraf f'miljuni. U l-istess nagħmel jien kieku nista.

Nirringrazzja l-Alla li fetaħ business Malta u gawdejt jien, fost ħafna Maltin. U ehe, ġie Malta 100% ħabba taxxi baxxi u pagi u spejjez relattivament baxxi. U grazzi għal hekk, ħabb lil Malta. Ħallas il-Maltin pagi tajbin ħafna. Nefaq ħafna. Għadu jġib lil familtu għal holiday kull sena. Ħallas miljuni lil avukati, awdituri, eċċ. I got to taste a lifestyle O wouldn't have otherwise.

Jien jiddispjaċini anzi li l-PN, umbat Dr Muscat, didn't go the distance. Imissna konna iktar aggressive f'tax efficiency. Naqta' rasi barra li li kieku kull Malti kellu l-opportunità igawdi kif kont iffortunat jien, kieku nivvotaw biex inkunu tax haven għax kulħadd igawdi lifestyle top end u jkun hawn ġid redikolu.

Fuq kollox, m'għadx hawn tax havens vera. Anqas il-Panama, ħabba CRS.

Re: EgyptAir accident. KMB was following the precedent set by Dom Mintoff in the 1973 KLM hijacking incident. Mintoff took the lead at the control tower and handled negotiations personally, with a positive outcome. This was a massive 747 with 247 people onboard. Of course, this strengthened Mintoff's reputation as a master negotiator, on the back of the 'legendary' early 1970s negotiations with the British Ministry of Defense on the military base lease agreement. One can reasonably assume that KMB felt the pressure to replicate the same method. 

Unfortunately, the circumstances of the EgyptAir hijacking were completely different, and the outcome was disastrous. As Dr. Abela Medici commented, the negotiations should have been handled by a professional with KMB focusing instead on fighting back pressure from the Egyptian government to send those crazy commandos. 

But this is what happens when a "larger than life" persona - fueled by a cult of personality - breaks all checks & balances intended for rational decision-making. 

Malta is so lucky to have someone like Dr. Abela Medici at the right time at the right place. Big things rest on the shoulders of very few who accept to deploy the best years of their lives towards the betterment of processes that will last the test of time. Thank you.

Mela Jon Mallia, li fil-verita hu bniedem genwin, sawwat kemm felah lil Gonzi imma mbaghad kien qisu haruf ma Sant u Sammy Meilaq. F'attentat iddisprat biex jidher imparzjali jispicca johloq egwaljanza falza bejn dak li hu genwin\dicenti u dak li hu manifestament hazin. Zball li jaghmluh hafna gurnalisti, u li jispicca jahsel l-immagini tal-partit laburista, li fil-verita kien u ghadu organizzazzjoni kriminali.

Ghal naqra mhux se jpingi lilu nnifsu qisu xi eroj difensur tal-indifizi dan. Meta l-marmalja li kien jaghmel parti minnha kienet issawwat studenti, ambjentalisti u kull min kien ifettlilha. Missu jmur jistahba kieku jaf jisthi.

Sur Sammy Meilaq tghidx gideb, jien ghixthom dawk iz-zmienijiet. Tista tghidli x'kienet dik id-darba, li fost ohrajn, meta tlajtu bit-trakkijiet taz-Tarzna u s-sawtuna l-istudenti  tas-sixth form u wara l-istudenti tal-universita'. Dak ma kienx vjolenza tghid int hux kontra zaghzagh innocenti. Dak gara ghax ahna ipprovokajniekom u mhux konna qed nipprotestaw pacifikament ghad-drittijiet taghna l-istudenti. Hu pacenzja, kont nistenniek lijekk trid tkun vera ragel, li l-inqas li stajt taghmel hu, li tappologgizza ghan-nom tas-shabek u l-partitarji Laburisti vjolentii u vandali ta' dak iz-zmien. Jien wiehed minn dawk li garrabna minn das-swat bil-ktajjen minnkhom allavolja konna nitilqu nigru. Kontu it-terrur tat-toroq, grazzi ghall-ghajnuna u sapport tal-Partit Laburista mmexxija minn Duminku u warajh Kermenu.
Sewwa qieghed jghid.

U mela, il-Partit Laburista kien aktar favur ir-Rerum Novarum meta is-Sur Meilaq daħal fil-Partit Laburista wara l-gwerra. U mhux hekk tgħid, tħammiġx il-memorja tar-Rerum Novarum u l-kbir Papa Ljun XIII. Mat-twaqqif il-PL kien isemmih, u ma kienx Soċjalista dakinhar, Laburiżmu u Soċjaliżmu mhux l-istess ħaġa. Intom is-"Soċjalisti" il-vera infiltrati fil-Partit Laburista li żvijajtuh. Anke l-Mons. Michele Gonzi kien wieħed mill-ewwel senaturi tal-Partit Laburista (li abbli kien jismu Partit tal-Ħaddiema, wara li kien jismu Camera del Lavoro). Fis-snin 20 in-Nazzjonalisti tal-PDN kellhom l-aqwa programm soċjali, u kienu jsejjħu għall-unjoni tal-forzi "nazzjonalisti" kollha, inkluż il-Laburisti li rieduhom fi front anti-Imperjalista! Il-Laburisti l-ewwel spiċċaw qishom krozza għall-UPM Panzavecchian, u wara spiċċajtu tilgħaqu lil Strickland l-ewwel u bis-Soċjaliżmu wara. U r-Rerum Novarum tikkundanna s-soċjaliżmu espliċitament, m'hemmx fejn taħrabha din. - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hn8x8kLhhaU - Il-kundanna kienet mistħoqqa, però kien hawn min ried ileħħaq m'Alla u max-Xitan u jilgħabha tal-vittma. U jiftaħar bil-Marxisti wkoll, u Luteru magħhom. Ħallina.

Ħadt il-briga nisma' kollox. Il-programm interessanti f'sens wiesa'. Intqalu veritajiet, u għalija ħafna nofs veritajiet, apparti affarijiet inkredibbli. Jien fil-1981 twelidt, nixtieq nara lil ħaddieħor jikkuntrastah u li kien hemm meta dan kien fl-iprem tal-"azzjoni diretta" tiegħu. Missieri kien ikun prim, Nazzjonalist fit-Tarzna fi żmien dan l-"eroj" tal-"ħaddiema", però ħallina għal ħajja aħjar fl-2012. Allaħares kien hawn missieri. Missieri kien ħaddiem industrijali, Nazzjonalistissimu (fil-fatt allaħares jara l-PN tal-lum, Alla ħabbu), fis-sindakati jirrappreżenta ħaddiema oħra, inklużi Laburisti li rrappreżentahom u ħadu drittijiethom qablu minħabba diriġenza diskriminatorja Laburista li ħallew tal-PN qabel l-1996 għall-konċiljazzjoni, ironikament kellu jkun taħt Gvern ta' Alfred Sant li tranġalu dak li talab u eventwalment ħa dak li kellu jieħu bi dritt.


Jon Mallia, ara ssibx xi militanti Nazzjonalisti ta' dak iż-żmien, ma tantx baqa' minnhom u mill-PN kapaċi tnaffru u tqażżu. Mhux xi gran Alla politikant ta, xi ħadd minn tal-Ġakketta l-Blu jew tal-Front Freedom Fighters. Nerġa' ngħid, allaħares ma kienx Fenech Adami l-ewwel u Alfred Sant warajh biex dawn it-tip ta' nies ngħatu għall-ġenb. Mintoff bil-guffaġni kollha li kien jipprojetta rridu ngħidu li ma kienx kapaċi jikkontrolla min ried u wasal biex wettaq il-vjolenza. Ara l-Kattoliku kalm Fenech Adami, meta ried jaqta' xi tentazzjoni ta' vjolenza qatagħha, u dan joħroġ ċar mill-episodju tal-Front Freedom Fighters, li missieri kien magħhom u waqaf meta l-Kap qalilhom daqshekk. Il-vjolenza fIl-politika ma kellnix xi rriduha u m'għandnix xi rriduha. Dik l-"azzjoni diretta"? Tirromantiċiżżawhx, u msieken dawn dejjem jirreaġixxu biss kienu. Mhux hekk tgħid.

Lil Sammy Meilak ngħidlu li missieri kien Nazzjonalist magħruf jaħdem it-Tarzna fil-bidu tas-snin tmenin u ma kienx se jiskot u jaqa' għall-intimidazzjoni, kien jidħol bl-"In-******* tagħna" miftuħa għax ma kienx jibża minn min mhux ix-xogħol u d-drittijiet tal-ħaddiema ried, imma ried li l-ħaddiema kollha jkunu militanti partiġġjani soċjalisti (u ħalluna wkoll, ħafna minnhom 'qas kienu jifhmu x'inhu s-soċjaliżmu). U qatt ma bagħad lil ħadd, anzi kellu każin tal-PN fis-snin 90 f'Tas-Sliema, meta kienu għadhom bil-bieb tal-metall blu, u kienu jiġu anke Laburisti jisservew u aktar minn hekk, però ma kienx iħalli min jgħaddi minn fuqu jew jagħlaqlu ħalqu. Kellu xi direttur li wissih li setgħu joqtluh b'"inċident", għax taf int it-tarzna tkun welder tiżloq minn fuq xi planka u toħroġ f'borża sewda ħabba "inċident" fuq il-post tax-xogħol. Ma kienx biżżejjed li missieru kien Nazzjonalist fit-Tarzna fil-gwerra u kważi spiċċa internat għax kien Nazzjonalist veru, ma' Nerik Mizzi. U meta qatlu lil Fusellu lill-missieri l-ewwel li ġabru dawk il-Pulizija rettissimi ta' żmien il-Gvern Soċjalista tal-Ġenerazzjoni Soċjalista, u forsi għamluh għax kellu mottiv tajjeb. Għalfejn, għax kien Nazzjonalist u mart il-Fusellu oħtu, li spiċċa jipproteġiha missieri minn dak li kien "jasal li jkun aggressiv", hekk ta issa xi eċċezzjoni ġustifikabbli u kien xi miskin dak. Ħa ngħidilek jien, meta tkellmu liberament fil-familja ħadd qatt ma lissen kelma favurih u wara mewtu ma għadux jibku dawk li kienu verament esperjenzawh, biex tifhmu. Ħassra missieri ħallina għal ħajja aħjar fl-2012, kieku kien jgħidlek erbat ikliem Sur Meilaq. Jon Mallia, ġib xi ħadd jikkontrasta lil dan il-persunaġġ, jekk baqa' minnhom. Iġġibx invijati tal-PN, dawk ottu llum. Imnalla kienu Fenech Adami u Alfred Sant. Pax et bonum, jien Kattoliku però nirrabbja, però nikkalma u nitlob għall-ġustizzja u l-paċi, kif tlabt għal ruħ Mintoff li żgur ma telgħax sparat il-ġenna. Però l-velenu nopponuh b'qawwa, għax l-istorja se tħammġuha u ħasra m'hemmx verżjoni alternattiva sura fl-istampa indipendenti.

Għall-kjarezza, jien ma nappoġġax lil Partit Nazzjonalista, għax il-PN mhux Nazzjonalist u Malta m'għandix bżonn aktar kretineriji tad-Demokrazija Kristjana, u lanqas nappoġġa politikament il-Partit Laburista għax kontra l-valuri tiegħi, li jissejsu fuq ir-Rerum Novarum ukoll, b'mod veru mhux bħal tal-Partit Laburista f'moħħ dal-bniedem, li huma fantażija. Biha bdejt u biha nikkonkludi.

When Fusellu was shot, he died almost immediately. But he was kept hooked up to machines at the hospital and more weirdly still, the Xandir Malta cameras were brought in to film him in bed linked up to tubes and pipes while, and this is where it gets really strange, half the Labour cabinet and assorted fixers sat round him looking like they weren’t even going to leave to go to the lavatory.

It was surreal: back at home we knew what Fusellu did and why half the government was glued to his dead body pretending it was alive – ON THE TELEVISION NEWS – but how might others have rationalised it?

Who was John Bondin and why were all those ministers fretting round his bed? Or maybe they didn’t wonder at all, because living in Malta was like living in a mob state.

Anyway, here is the story of why they pretend he was alive when he wasn’t, and why they brought in the cameras to film him ‘dying’.

Several Labour ministers and other Labour big names had their monies in bank accounts in Fusellu’s name (he did their fixing, made their deals, collected their protection money and was their main enforcer in their extortion rackets).

As a precaution, they had obtained from him an irrevocable power of attorney (prokura), authorizing them to withdraw the money – one form of retaining control over their loot, just in case.

A power of attorney lapses automatically the moment the person who signs it dies.

The Ministers (and the others) panicked: if Fusellu was dead, THEY COULD NOT RECOVER THEIR MONEY FROM THE BANK.

So Fusellu was kept ‘alive’ just long enough for them to be able to make use of his power of attorney and withdraw their monies ‘legally’.

When the last penny had been withdrawn, Fusellu was pronounced dead.

His wife’s accountants later advertised in the newspapers for information on the whereabouts of many of his possessions, including his cars.

Il-Fusellu’s mother was Dom Mintoff’s maid. Super One interviewed her among the mourners standing at Mintoff’s gate a few days ago: “Jien kont nahdem mieghu ghal hafna snin, bhala seftura”.

Mintoff didn’t pay Mrs Bondin for her services. Instead he fixed things so that her husband would be sent abroad for medical treatment – you know, as a personal favour and not because we have a reciprocal health agreement with Britain, and found a job for him when he got back.

And an indebted Mrs Bondin skivvied for him in return.

Inmate Louis Bartolo, who was accused of shooting dead John Bondin, known as Il-Fusellu, escaped from prison on June 10, 1982 together with another prisoner, Ahmed Khalil Habib, a Palestinian charged with slaying a Lebanese man in Gzira.

Mr Bartolo mysteriously slipped out of the country and on his return in June 1987, he stood trial and was found not guilty of Mr Bondin's murder.

During court proceedings, Mr Bartolo alleged that Mr Theuma had been involved in the escape of the Palestinian inmate and was rewarded for his part by a group of Arabs.

A magisterial inquiry into this allegation, however, found that there was no basis for such allegations which "showed a certain animosity vis-à-vis the prison authorities".

Thus, Mr Theuma was cleared of the allegations made in his regard.

Daphne Caruana Galizia.

Jason Azzopardi hu bniedem mibghud minn bosta u mahbub minn ohrajn. Mibghud ghax jghid il-verita u fid-dinja min hu onest ibghati. Lil Jason, il-Gvern hadem hafna biex jaghmel character assassination fuqu u sa certu punt irnexxielu. Il-verita hi li Jason hu bniedem sincier u dak li jara hazin jghidlu hazin minghajr ebda kantunieri u kontra kulhadd, irrespettivament jekk hux persuna fil-partit li jappogja hu jew ta' kull partit iehor. Hasra li persuni bhal dawn jigu mwarrba mill-politika.

L-antipatija li ghandu Jon Mallia ghal Jason Azzopardi tinhass pjuttost qawwijja f'din l-intervista. Fil-vertita' hassejt li Jason irribatta kwazi kollox b'mod tajjeb u pjuttost qawwi, hlief fuq il-kas ta' Prudente, li, taqbel jew ma taqbilx fuq l-abort, huwa car li it-teoriji ta' komplotti ma jaghmlux sens f'dal-kas. Bottom line, nahseb li il-pregji ta' Jason Azzopardi jghelbu b'mod massicc id-difetti tieghu u b'dispjacir ikolli nghid li il-politika Maltija, kif ukoll il-pajjiz in generali, sofra telfa enormi bl-eskluzjoni tieghu mill-hajja  politika.

Hsieb zghir fuq il grajja ta San Pawl, nistaw nikkunsidraw li San Pawl verament gie fuq il gzejjer Maltin, imma n nies li laqawh wara l maltempata ma kienux nies lokali imma grupp li nzerta maqbut fil gzejjer. (forsi bahhara ukoll ?)

Punti ghal dan l argument:
1)	Il grupp li laqawh, san Luqa jirreferi ghalijhom, ta Ruman li kien, bhala Barbari, (nies li la jitkellmu grieg u lanqas Latin), nies li kienu joqodu hawnekk , “Maltin” x aktarx kienu nies li gejjin mill Italja jew Sqallija, kienu jitkellmu b dawn il lingwi, kif jixhdu l fdalijiet li ghandna ta dak z zmien. Mela Barbari ma kienux
2)	Jekk kienu nies nativi tal gzejjer Maltin, kienu jkunu jafu li sriep velenuzi ma kienx hawn fil gzejjer. Mela meta raw lill San Pawl jingidem, u ma jinstabatx , kieku kienu nies lokali ma kienux jiehdu xokk, jew iqisuh bhala meraklu. N nies li laqawh u nhasdu , kienu tal idea li jekk ingdimt minn serp, ma fadallekx wisq hajja, ghax hekk kienu draw bis sriep f pajjizhom
3)	Jekk kienu n nies tal lokall ma nimmaginax li waqt maltempata matul l lejl, kienu ha jkunu max xatt, izda migburin gewwa darhom. X aktarx n nies li laqawh kienu nqabdu bhalhom ghawnek fuq l gzira bil vapur taghhom u kienu qed jistennew t temp jikkalma, qabel ikomplu bil vjagg tahhom

Bonus Point:  Kieku n nies li laqawh kienu Maltin, ibqa zgur li san Luqa kien jikteb li laqawh bil frazi: “Go back to your country”

Id-demm Malti thallat maz-zmien, u dak huwa s-sbuhija tieghu. Jiena gej minn familja li thaltet ma' demm Ingliz fil-passat, il-buznannu tieghi Ingliz, imma llum il-gurnata la jien u l-anqas hadd minn familti ma nqis bhala Inglizi. Bl-istess mod, ghandi hbieb tieghi li minkejja li m'ghandhomx qattra demm Maltija f'demmhom, jitkelmu bil-Malti aqwa minn skoss Maltin "puri" u li ghalija huma Maltin daqsi.

Tradizzjonalment, Malta dejjem kienet f'nofs passa ta' gnus ikbar huma u jinnegozzjaw u jitqatlu fil-bahar. Il-famuz assedju li erbahna fl-1565 il-Maltin iggilidnih biswit Griegi, Sqallin, Francizi, Spanjoli - u llum inhossuha bhala rebha Maltija. It-tahlita sabiha ta' kunjomijiet li ghandna turi li maz-zmien, sa ricentissimu, thallatna u addottajna, u konna kuntenti naghmluha.

Illum qed nitkelmu qisna ahna xi razza li waqajna minn Kripton u issa gejjin aljeni ohrajn jinvaduna. Is-sabih ta' Malta kien li dejjem thallatna b'mod organiku, influwenzati min-negozju u l-geopolika prevalenti ta' kull zmien. Il-problema veru hi li t-tahlita li ghamilna issa mhix organika.

Biex niehdu hsieb li l-Bandiera Maltija tibqa' fil-quccata u mhux dik "tal-Bangladesh", irridu nuru ghozza u rispett lejha qabel kollox. Qed nimpurtaw il-haddiema bhalma nimpurtaw iz-zraben jew il-hwejjeg. Dawn qed ingibuhom biex jahdmu xoghlijiet, li probabli ahna ma rridux naghmlu. Fl-ebda punt mill-process ma niehdu hsieb li dawn il-haddiema, li qed jaghmlu xoghol siewi ghall-ekonomija, jintegraw. Li jitkelmu bil-Malti. Li nghallmuhom fuq l-istorja taghna. Tajjeb li dawn id-dar jitkelmu bir-Russu, bis-Serb, b'xi lingwa minn ta' l-Indja, bl-Urdu, bil-Bangladexi u bil-bqija - il-Malti b'hekk sar il-lingwa sabiha li hu llum. Imma tajjeb li jkunu jafu jitkelmu sew il-Malti ukoll.  

Tajjeb li jigu ghall-festi u jixorbu flixkun Kinnie maghna, u jekk ihossuhom komdu jieklu xi ikla spaghetti bil-fenek maghna.

U min jaf, forsi ghada pit ghada, ir-ricetta tal-istuffat tal-fenek ikollha xi hwawar li ziedu maghhom huma. Forsi nibdew nieklu xi lampuka mixwija biz-zejt, u b'xi chili li jimlilek qalbek bix-xemx Maltija int u ttaffi l-ugiegh fuq ilsienek b'tazza inbid tajba.

U forsi minnhom nitghallmu inkunu pacenzjuzi u rispettuzi lejn l-ambjent u l-fawna, mhux biss furnelli Mediterranji.

The birthrate imbalance debate is deeply flawed. At this point we got used to these paranoid arguments, which no matter what anyone says or thinks, lead only to far-right politics (as other countries outside the Maltese bubble clearly show). Why not ask why you see no teenage (16+) kids working in establishments anymore? What changed so radically in 10-15 years? A whole lot, granted. However, it's impossible that all Maltese teenage kids don't want to engage in some form of part-time work, which was the norm up until a few years ago.

I had a much higher opinion of Sandra Gauci. This chat showed how unprepared she is and that her ideas (not proposals) are extremely shallow. I was also extremely disappointed by her attitude when you touched on abortion. For someone who claims that she wants to build bridges, listen and hold discussions even with those who hold opposing views, she came across as someone with no arguments. She immediately got defensive and stuck to a mantra (it's my body therefore it's my choice) without offering any substantial arguments. I'm very open-minded when it comes to these topics and I don't appreciate people who expect us to agree with them just because they said so - irrespective of the subject being discussed. One last thing: how can you create smaller schools (which I definitely agree with) when there is a massive shortage of teachers - even by her own admission. Talk is cheap.

Oh. One other thing. just because her dad acted like an autocratic macho when she was young, it doesn't mean that all men do the same. I appreciate that her feminism stems from this experience but she should be open-minded enough to realise that generalisations lead to logical fallacies. It's like saying that all white people are mass murderers because most of the serial killers thus far were white.

My 1st recording experience was with this guy! 
If many who have worked with him have cried, on the other hand, for me meeting him was an epiphany as he made me understand that if one believes in themselves, music will always reward them back.
The younger me back then asked him how could I live from music, and his simple but blunt words were "think music & the rest fill the blanks, but never fit in music within the rest of your daily schedule". 
Success is not by chance, but something one works for, and nowadays I live off music in London.

Profs Pule' might an excellent engineer, but he severely overestimates his own prowess when it comes the study of anthropology.  The hogwash he put forward with regards to evolution of intelligence from Africa is nowadays recognised to be completely wrong and rooted in racism, not very much different from the ideas prevalent at the beginning of the 20th century and which gave fuel to nationalist movements such as Nazism. Perhaps he should leverage the learning skills he is so proud of and use them to learn some humility.

The man’s concepts are revolutionary and progressive.  One needs to listen with care and attention in order to understand and decipher not only what he is saying, but rather what he means.
Back in 1993, I am thankful to have been one of professor Pule’s students and my appreciation and gratitude towards this man is lifelong.

I fully understand that this gentlemen is from another time. To not challenge him, however, on some of the absurd comments he made is much worse. Nowadays in Africa there are engineers 10x brighter than him. Check among many others Rwanda's medical drone project. Also, regarding the "in Africa they have drums only" comment. I mean, it's widely agreed that almost every existing genre of music on Earth has its roots in African communities and their diasporas around the world. Einstein got nothing on you, promise.

Matthew forgot to mention that one very good reason why cars on the road are an asset to any government in power is that they're a source of income. I would estimate it to be around 85M in road tax alone, with importation tax and vat revenue from the business surrounding cars. A big negative would be that fuel subsides right now are draining government finances. Probably, moving away from cars would mean we will need to get money from elsewhere to keep up maintaining car infrastructure. Hopefully it won't translate into more construction.

It's FEMA (not fehema) for Faculty of Economics Management & Accountancy. If you really want to understand that crucial in-between period (1798-1800), which is way more complicated than portrayed in this podcast, get Charles Xuereb or Henry Frendo. Malta became official colony in 1814, after the British ignored the treaty of Amiens (which essentially was a treaty agreed by superpowers in Europe, including the British, that gave the right to the Knights to continue to administer the country). This is not to mention that Xuereb has recently wrote a seminal book treating the need to decolonise the Maltese mind (Decolonising the Maltese Mind).

Nemmen b'sinċerità li wasal iż-żmien li l-Partit Nazzjonalista jieħu l-poter tal-Gvern. Il-PN jinsab lest biex jerġa' jmexxi lil Malta u lill-Maltin. Malta għandha bżonn gvern li jirrispetta lill-poplu kollu mingħajr sens partiġjan u jekk inħarsu lejn il-passat naraw li l-Partit Nazzjonalista kien dejjem il-partit li ħadem għal Malta u mhux għall-partit. Kien għalhekk li Malta kienet soda finanzjarjament bħala nazzjon taħt gvern Nazzjonalista, iżda dan b'riżultat li l-partit kellu jbati l-konsegwenzi finanzjarji. Għal dan il-għan Malta għandha bżonn lill-Partit Nazzjonalista li jġib lil Malta u l-poplu qabel l-interessi tal-partit tiegħu. Illum jien konvint.

Regarding Galileo, it ‘only’ took the Vatican 359 years to apologize for their actions. Apparently they wanted to make really, really sure that he knew what he was talking about!

Also Columbus did not believe in a flat earth  and nor did the rest of the educated westerners of his time. It is a persistent myth that Columbus set out to prove the earth was not flat, but in reality he did nothing of the sort. But the shape and approximate circumference of the earth had been known since the ancient Greeks.

Jon, your biology doesn't dictate that you have a monogamous relationship but if you are a man with a normal level of testosterone you would want to mate with multiple women. it is a conscious decision you took that makes you mate with 1 woman only. other forms of biology is aggression ( a normal human behavioral trait)  Some people act out their aggression while others are able to withhold it. Sexuality, is it a more difficult thing to abstain from?... yes but what Matthew is saying is, that's his cross and he is carrying it to please his God.

Nikkumenta naqa tard imma issa kellhi cans narah il-Podcast.  Biss nixtieq naghmel kumment ghax ma kienx korret f'xi haga Clint  u li hemm naqra misinterpratazjoni.  Putin's demands ma kienux biss li l-Ukraina ma tinaqadx ma Nato, imma ukoll li t-truppi kollha tan-Nato jinqallaw minn Eastern Europe u li ma tipprotegix lil dawn il-pajjizi jekk jigu under attack.  Putin li ejja nghidu kellhu ragun li beda jibza li n-Nato ha tersaq qrib, imma uza din biex jipprova jiehu izjed vantagg u prattikament jerga jipprova jibni l-Unjoni Sovjetika (li fi kliemu kienet l-ikbar diskrazzja li qatt grat).  

Din in-narativa hemm barra (li minniex nghid li Clint qieghed jipusha biss li hija improtanti li tigi imfemha sew) li l-gwerra bdiet tort tan-NATO u tal-Ewropa hija tad-dahq - Putin mignun biss ha jispicca hazin ghax tlett affarijiet sejrin jigru; sejjer jitlef (ekonomija down the drain, l-oligarchs shabu spiccaw hazin u one fine day ha idduru fuqhu, brain drain fil-pajjiz ghax in-nies intelligenti telqu, etc), Ukraina izjed ha tisfidina u tidhol fl-EU u fin-NATO u lil NATO tawa scope li ghall-20 sena ma kellhiex + added bonus ghax dahlu Sweden u Finland.
Hasra li mohhok m'ghandux biceps ukoll Jon 🤣

Podcast tajjeb u prosit Jon ghax mhux tahdita facli. Certu argumenti tal-mistieden kienu konflingenti. Filli jghid l-gwerra hazina u filli ghandu rizervi fuq war crimes cari. Fuq Putin, filli jghid kontrih imbaghad jghid li s'issa mhux gravi daqs Hitler (meta ghamel bhalu!). Jghid li qishu l-UE tibla' l-lixka u Von der Leyden mhux tmexxi sew, u jghid li kien jistenna qabel jiehu decizjonijiet kontra r-Russja/Putin (ihallih jidhol go Kiev!?). Qed jghid li l-UE aghlqet il-ventilatur ghad-diskussjoni (x'hemm x'tiddiskuti ma dittatur qattiel!?). U ohra gravi, jghid li jaghmel referendum fi regjuni Ukreni... Referendum meta kulhadd harab?! U b'dak l-argument anke go postijiet ohra jsir dan ir-referendum bla sens, u dan kollhu ghax Putin ried gwerra ohra!? Mistieden bla dubju intelligenti hafna pero' qishu qed iwahhal fl-UE ghal certu affarijiet li zgur mhumiex hatjin taghhom - hsiebijiet konflingenti u inkoerenti ghall-ahhar.

This interview really aged as good as milk.

Sir Rizzo,

I had the pleasure, of joining the force under your stout leadership albeit briefly. I also had the pleasure of working with all 3 of your sons during my service, whom strive to be as great as you were. They inherited all your great qualities, you should be proud.

I always strived to be as respectable as you ever wear but these are truly large shoes to fill, but I can wholeheartedly say that the little I fill, I was always integral, loyal and as objective driven as you ever were without prejudice. I also had the pleasure, of meeting you face to face after you retired from the Police were you still dispense wise council which helped me grow.

I thank you for all you have done with us, even though your forced removal was of poor taste. You will always be our father (proven by your empathetic moving speech whilst talking about our deceased brother, Mark Farrugia) and we your loyal children, we may not be bound by blood but we are bound by other bonds which the normal citizenry cannot fathom.

You are still our commissioner, and we your fellow loyal brothers, sisters, sons, daughters.

Should you ever require our aid, we would drop everything to come to assist.

Domine Dirige Nos.

Hi Jon, what you discussed  , about why we love music is exactly how you explained it! I would contribute, that the reason behind that is because our sense of hearing is the sense that is the strongest and requires our full attention, therefore when it is occupied we are in the present, one of the most beautiful thing one can experience. Other senses allow us to still think about other things in the past & future. Learned this from philosophy. 
When I am overwhelmed with thoughts I stop for a pause and focus just on the hearing. One will be amazed at how many things can be heard, that before one didn't pay attention to.

There is great danger with cryptocurrencies because financial privacy leads to financial fraud.  They are only used by speculators looking for quick riches, people who don't like government-backed currencies, and criminals who want a black-market way to exchange money.  Cryptocurrencies simply shift some of the trust in people and institutions to trust in technology.   They also require speculation in order to function.  Furthermore, if your bitcoin exchange or your bitcoin wallet gets hacked, you loose all of your money.  And there is no recourse.  Maybe the maltese people think they can be smarter than Apple Co-Founder Steve Wozniak, who was scammed out of $70K in bitcoin.  The universal truism is that you do not solve social problems with technology. Malta 2024. The Labour party currently running the country won the 2013 election on a promise. A government for the people. No us and them. The people had become tired of the same old tune. The Nationalist party became unappealing and irrelevant to  the people's aspirations. All the good attained during challenging times was taken for granted. People's expectations increased in quantity and quality. Sadly the majority sought only more economic purchasing power and glamour, and gave little importance to other issues, that probably matter more, such as education and the environment.  And the Labour party understood this very well by disbursing monetary benefits, the so called ' tax reimbursements', incidentally during opportune times, such as just before the election 2022 or immediately after the revelation of a potential scandal, supporting along the way social activities which appeal to the masses - panem et circensis. Rampant and blatant corruption are of no concern for the majority, rather a way of life. It's not that the Italian Mafia impresses much. Locally we have our own insatiable Maltese DNA to loot and plunder on every available occasion ('sibi' bil- Malti u 'kursara') and there you have the concoction in motion, that is, until such governance remains sustainable. So what happens when people start being deprived of their basic needs? Only time will tell. At the moment not even an ever increasing deficit does not appear to be of any concern. And a change in government will probably not happen any time soon unless the people in general don't have enough steaks in the freezer or the parties and opposition are found relevant to the people's (financial) needs. Sadly, nowadays more than ever, money is not the root of all evil rather it does make the world go round. Hope it won't spin too fast leaving us all dizzy and confused.

Re Hitler
Contrary to popular believe, the Nazi party in Germany was never elected to parliament with a majority. 

At one point, Hitler was elected into parliament and his party garnered around 35% of the vote. Hitler did not make it to president, however, he was later appointed as chancellor on the strength that the popular support of his party would somehow improve gov support. He usurped his position, expanded his role, and managed to get emergency powers.   He managed to manipulate the vote in parliament (arrests and negotiations) to grant the cabinet the powers to legislate bypassing all the democratic checks and balances for just 4 years -  effectively turning himself into a dictator



https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Enabling_Act_of_1933

Gengis Khan lived in 1220 era - ie 800 years ago.  There is mathematical modelling that aims to establish "how many generations are needed to find a common ancestor to a present population" and "how many generations are needed to reach the identical generation". 

This is a rough calculation:  Considering the population of Mongolia is 3.278M it takes approx 21 generations (approx 650 - 1000 years) to reach a point where there is one person who is a common ancestor to all of the population of the present day.  It happens to be that Gengis Khan lived approx 800 years ago.  

Refer to "Every  baby is a Royal baby - Numberphile" on youtube) for a simplified explanation

Salvu fil-history hawwad ftit. L-ewwel haga it-teorija ta' Wied ir-Rum hija ta' Gan Frangisk Abela u mhux Wettiger. Godfrey Wettinger  ma jaqbilx li kien hemm kontinwita' tal-Kristjanezmu bil-migja tal-Gharab. Propju ghalhekk ma jezistux kliem Malti li gej mill-Puniku izda l-eqdem kliem huwa kollu mill-Gharbi. It-tieni n-Normanni ma nafu kwazi xejn x'ghamlu Malta u dik ta San Mikiel is-Sancir jew Sincier saret wara. Fil-fatt tul il-hakma Normanna mill-oqbra li sibna nafu li kein hawn hafna Musulmani u l-Insara li kien hawn kienu x'aktarx tar-rit Ortodos jew Grieg. Ghalhekk dik il-knisja kienet ta' San Cir fiz-zmien ir-Normanni(1091-1197) jew aktar probabli fiz-zmien il-Hohenstaufen (1197-1250) u jista' jkun anki aktar tard u saret tal-kattolici flok Ortodossi x'aktarx fiz-zmien l-Aragonizi (1283-1530),

Però, bħala parti "mill-elite tal-qlafat" li sejjaħt għal bojkott, nixtieq jiġu ċċarati 4 affarijiet.
L-ewwelnett, dan min l-imniefaħ appuntah spokesperson tal-kuxjenza Maltija?
It-tieni, ħdimt f'ħafna produzzjonijiet ferm aħjar minn tiegħu bil-Malti. U għidt sewwa, Jon, li t-teatru ma jibdiex u jieqaf it-Teatru Manoel. Biss biss Sant'Iermu ttellgħet musical fuq is-Sette Giugno, artistika mmens, u n-nies marret bi ħġara taraha.
Jekk mingħalih li qed joffri kwalità, biżżejjed tara d-design tal-poster u t-trailer li ħareġ ta' Ix-Xiħa li jwaqqa' l-istandard.
Hemm xeba gideb ukoll, għax meta tkellimt ma' xi ħadd li kien involut mal-produzzjoni ta' Ix-Xiħa, it-theddid sar minn MPA. Jekk mingħalih li l-industrija tal-arti timxi fuq kunflitti u theddid, u qed iqabbel l-industrija ta' Malta ma' dik ta' Hollywood, mela tista' li MPA hu l-Harvey Weinstein jew Scott Rudin ta' Malta.
Hija inkreddibli li mhux jara ebda kunflitt ta' interess li jtella' plays tiegħu stess ġewwa l-Manoel, meta hu wkoll responsabbli li "irawwem" talent Malti ġdid. Iva, vera li m'hemmx biżżejjed awturi Maltin, mhux għax mhux tajbin, imma għax qatgħu qalbhom li xi darba xogħlhom jittella' l-Manoel wara li ħonqu MPA.
Biex ma jmurx jgħid li qed ngħid li m'għandux dritt itella' plays. Għandu dritt itella' plays, imma mhux il-Manoel, appuntu minħabba kunflitt ta' interess.

This is a very slippery slope. Satire is meant to be offensive, whichever side of the fence you're on. Shame that Jon can't be objective in this case, Mario Philip Azzopardi's often bizarre political stances and the lack of subtlety present in his play are irrelevant.

Storja importanti li tinstema, l-isfruttament sfaċċat f'Malta inkredibbli. Grazzi Jon u l-bqija tat-team.

Jon, qed tagħti servizz kbir lis-soċjetà b'dawn il-poddati. Qed ukoll tuża l-Malti, u naħseb li parti mis-suċċess ta' dawn il-poddati huwa l-fatt li qed jintuża l-Malti. Minkejja li ħafna jħossuhom komdi jitkellmu bl-Ingliż, fil-verità, biex jisimgħu xi ħaġa fit-tul iħossuhom aktar komdi jisimgħu bil-Malti, u naħseb li dawk intervistati minnek iħossuhom aktar komdi jesprimu ruħhom bil-Malti minflok bl-Ingliż.

Il-kwalità hija għolja f'ħafna aspetti, pereżempju l-elementi viżivi u awdittivi. Għalhekk jiddispjaċini li nara Malti użat ħażin. Għandek libsa mill-isbaħ imma xi mkien għandha tebgħa, u jiena personali għajnejja fuq dik it-tebgħa qed jaqgħu. 

Pereżempju, it-titlu (tant importanti) għandu jinqara: Carmel Borg: Il-Viżjoni ta' Carmel | C3| Jon Mallia Podcast. Il-parti ta' isfel tista' tinkiteb hekk:

Carmel jemmen li l-istudenti għandhom jiġu mħejjija għal dinja ideali u mhux għad-dinja li għandna preżentament.

Ċert li hawn ħafna li lesti jgħinuk, jiena wieħed minnhom.

What Mr Borg is saying makes a lot of sense and hits the nail on the head. I talk from personal experience in tutoring at Mcast and University and various other entities.... it takes courage to go against the ingrained system. Most teachers go in with enthusiasm and ideas but in the vast majority of cases the system does not condone or back up new ideas and concepts. The system is only interested in the smooth and uncontroversial running of educational institutions.. no one that 'shakes the tree is welcome.' This leads to a number of valid educators leaving the system (if they can) or just becoming interested in their remuneration and more or less becoming unresponsive cogs of the system...

Argumentazzjoni impekkabli pero ma tistax tisma lil Prof Borg jitkellem minghajr ma titbissem u thoss dieqa fl-istonku ghax id-dipartiment tal-edukazzjoni huwa parti mill-kankru li ghadna fis-settur edukattiv f'pajjizna. Mhux qed nghid ghal prof Borg imma sejjahtlu kankru ghax hija l-analogija perfetta. Kankru ma jghaddix biz-zmien jew b'xi pirmla imma trid tnehhih ghax joqtol. Bl-istess mod certu nies fl-edukazzjoni li jippriedkaw l-inkluzzivita u jghagixxu bi hdura, ma jigux biz-zmien, jew b'xi polza izda jitkeccew iridu. Qed nitkellem minn esperjenza.

Smajtu b'attenzjoni kbira u ma ddejjaqt xejn, anzi bi hsiebni nerga nisimghu.  Huwa ta' ghajb kbir kif il-media u l-istat ma jtuhx ir-rikonniximent li jisthoqlu!  Nitolbok, terga ggibu jitkellem Jon ghax baqalghu hafna aktar xi jghid fuq l-edukazzjoni u l-gustizzja socjali!

Ma' nistax ma' naqbilx mall-bzonn tat-tahrig lil ghalliem. Imma mhux biss! Dak li jsawwar  ghalliem mhuwiex biss it-tahrig wisq formali li jiehu mill-universita'. Ghandna krizi ta' valuri, krizi fl-attitudni, krizi fid-dixxiplina personali, krizi morali, socjeta' mhux gusta u 'l kumplament...l-akkademici l-universita', l-ghalliema, il-genituri u l-istudenti huma wkoll prodott ta' din is-socjeta'. Sigra b'gheruq morda difficli taghtik frott tajjeb! L-ewwel trid tfejjaq l-gherq...nehtiegu tassew riflessjoni sinciera bhala poplu.

Vera kien episodju tajjeb u itik x tahseb u tirrifletti, proset. Sfortunatament edukatturi bħal Carmel togħddhom fuq subajk u huma rari. Mill-esperjenza ta' studenta, ħafna edukatturi fl-Universita' jippruvaw jippronwovu din l'idea ta' tgħallim li qed jgħid biha Carmel, pero, meta niġu fiha, ma issirx. Fl-esperjenza tiegħi meta tagħti l' oppinjoni tiegħek, li taf tkun differenti min tal-lecturer, ir-reazzjoni tkun jew passiva, fejn l opinjoni tieghek insmat, imma il-lecturer ma tahix valur, jew inkella ta' argument, fejn qed juri car li l' oppinjoni tiegħek iħossha żbaljata. U meta ikollok esperjenza hekk timbutak biex darbohra ma terġax tesprimi l' oppinjoni tiegħek, imma toqod kwieta u muta għal kumplament tal-lezzjoni, u mbgħad jinfiskaw ruħhom meta l-studenti jibqaw kwieti u ma jieħdux sehem f'diskussjoni. Hemm ħafna x'tarbel u tannaliża, u forsi xi darba tibda il-mixja għal bidla min din it-tip ta' edukazzjoni limitata.

Il-bazi ta din id-diskussjoni nhoss li gej mit-teorija ta' Jack Mezirow, 'transformational learning', li hi iktar iffukata fuq it-tghalim tal-adulti. Fuq dawn il-principji ta' paradigm shift etc. naqbel perfettament. Pero, wahda mid-diffikulta li nsib f'din il-poddata hi li ma ssirx distinzjoni bejn Pedagogija u Andragogija. Ghalkemm il-principji tat-tghalim huma simili pero nemmen li l-modi kif wiehed iwassal l-gherf huma differenti. Nassumi, li r-restrizzjoniniet imponuti mis-sillabu fuq l-ghalliema jghamluha kwazi impossibbli biex l-ghalliem jghati l-opportunita' lill-istudent ikun jista jistaqsi biex jakwista l-gherf u mhux biss jassimila gharfien gdid/riciklat. Fuq livell terzjarju jidher xaqq ta' dawl, ghaliex ltqajt ma letturi ohra bhal Professur Borg li jiffacilitaw t-tghalim iktar milli jindotrinaw lill-istudenti. Mela, t-tama li jkollna poplu jahseb b'aktar mod kritiku ma tliftiex. Ghalkemm nahseb iridu jghaddu ammont ta generazzjonijiet mhux hazin biex issir din il-qabza fil-hsieb.

Lol...stajtu toqghod naqra attenti meta tkunu quddiem it TV, b'naqra halib shun u pakkett cookies jew Bourbon. The Rose of Versailles is set in France before and during the French Revolution. The primary character of the story is Marie Antoinette, the teenaged Dauphine and later Queen of France, but the series later re-focuses to a woman named Oscar François de Jarjayes. As the youngest of six daughters, Oscar was raised like a son from birth by her military general father to succeed him as commander of the Royal Guard at the Palace of Versailles. Oscar's friend (and later lover) André Grandier, a commoner who is the grandson of her nanny, serves as her attendant.

The primary action of the story revolves around Oscar's growing realization of how France is governed, and of the plight of the country's poor. When Antoinette begins an affair with the Swedish count Axel von Fersen, their relationship becomes the subject of gossip and scandal throughout France, and Antoinette's reputation is damaged. After von Fersen leaves Europe to fight in the American Revolutionary War, a distraught Antoinette begins spending lavishly on jewellery and clothing to distract herself from his absence. Her spending mires France in debt, while the Affair of the Diamond Necklace and the machinations of the scheming Duchess of Polignac further aggravate public sentiment toward the monarchy.

As the revolution intensifies, Oscar is unable to ignore the suffering of the French public, and leaves the Royal Guard to join the French Guards. André dies fighting alongside Oscar with the revolutionaries and the French Guards during a skirmish with the military; Oscar herself dies the following day, leading the revolutionaries during the Storming of the Bastille. Sometime thereafter, Antoinette and the royal family are taken as prisoners by the revolutionaries. After being tried by the Revolutionary Tribunal, Antoinette is sentenced to death by guillotine.

More than 12 yrs for a cycling policy document..  This is what 30 seconds of work looks like with Chat GPT. no excuses :/


Cycling Policy and Guidelines for the Maltese Islands

Introduction:
Cycling is an eco-friendly and efficient mode of transportation that promotes health, reduces congestion, and enhances the overall quality of life. These cycling policy and guidelines are intended to provide a standardized approach to the design and implementation of cycling lanes and infrastructure on the Maltese Islands, drawing inspiration from successful practices in similar countries. By prioritizing cyclist safety, convenience, and accessibility, we aim to encourage cycling as a viable mode of transportation.

1. Cycling Infrastructure Design:
1.1 Separated Cycle Lanes: Designate physically separated cycling lanes on major roads to ensure the safety of cyclists and minimize conflicts with motorized traffic.

1.2 Connected Networks: Develop a comprehensive cycling network that connects residential areas, commercial centers, educational institutions, and public transportation hubs to encourage seamless and convenient cycling journeys.

1.3 Intersection Design: Implement cyclist-friendly intersection designs such as cycle-specific traffic lights, separate signal phases for cyclists, and clear markings to facilitate safe crossing.

1.4 Shared Paths: Provide shared paths for pedestrians and cyclists in areas with lower traffic volumes, clearly demarcating zones for each user group.

1.5 Parking Facilities: Establish secure and well-lit bicycle parking facilities at key locations, including transit stations, shopping centers, and public institutions, to encourage cycling as a combined mode of transport.

2. Safety Measures:
2.1 Protected Intersections: Prioritize the safety of cyclists by incorporating protected intersections, where physical barriers separate cyclists from turning vehicles.

2.2 Buffer Zones: Create buffer zones between cycle lanes and vehicular traffic to minimize the risk of collisions and provide a sense of security for cyclists.

2.3 Visibility: Ensure adequate lighting and visibility for cycling lanes during both day and night to enhance cyclist safety.

2.4 Traffic Calming: Integrate traffic-calming measures, such as speed bumps and raised crosswalks, to reduce vehicle speeds near cycling routes.

3. Signage and Markings:
3.1 Clear Signage: Use internationally recognized cycling signage and markings to indicate the presence of cycling lanes, bike routes, and potential hazards.

3.2 Directional Signage: Install directional signage at critical points to guide cyclists and help them navigate the cycling network efficiently.

3.3 Lane Markings: Clearly mark cycling lanes with distinctive color and symbols to prevent encroachment by motorized vehicles.

4. Education and Outreach:
4.1 Public Awareness: Launch educational campaigns to promote cycling etiquette, road safety rules, and mutual respect between cyclists and motorists.

4.2 Cycling Education: Introduce cycling safety education programs in schools, focusing on practical cycling skills, traffic awareness, and proper helmet usage.

4.3 Community Engagement: Encourage community involvement through cycling events, workshops, and public forums to gather feedback and address concerns.

5. Maintenance and Upkeep:
5.1 Regular Maintenance: Conduct routine maintenance of cycling lanes and infrastructure to ensure they remain safe, functional, and visually appealing.

5.2 Pothole Repair: Prioritize swift repair of potholes and surface irregularities along cycling routes to prevent accidents and discomfort for cyclists.

6. Monitoring and Evaluation:
6.1 Data Collection: Gather data on cycling usage, safety incidents, and user satisfaction to assess the effectiveness of the cycling infrastructure and make informed improvements.

6.2 Periodic Reviews: Conduct regular reviews of the cycling policy and guidelines to incorporate advancements in design, technology, and best practices.

By adopting these cycling policy and guidelines, the Maltese Islands can create a conducive environment for cycling, improving the overall transportation landscape, promoting healthier lifestyles, and contributing to a more sustainable future.

Poddata interessanti u kudos lil BG talli ghamel lilu nnifsu disponibbli ghal mistoqsijiet ta' pjattaforma li taghti widen ghal mistoqsijiet tan-nies. 

Inhoss li ghandi bzonn inqajjem punt fid-diskursata sa fejn jien rilevanti jien bhala gurnalist f'Malta. Rigward il-punt tal-obbligu tal-media li jirrapurtaw lil kullhadd ugwalment, din hija logical fallacy totali li ghandha bzonn tigi eradikata, u ser nispjega ghalfejn inhoss li dak huwa l-kaz.

Bhala punt tat-tluq, jien nahdem ma' entita' zghira, b'tim zghir u dedikat, li nlahhqu ma' kollox u nimxu fuq ix-xejn. Hdimt ukoll ma' gazzetta akbar fejn kien hemm hafna aktar rizorsi disponibbli. F'dawn iz-zewg istanzi, rajt dejjem haga wahda li kienet realta' ugwalment difficli ghal kull min kien qieghed jaghmel xoghlu fil-kamra tal-ahbarijiet: kuljum, ikollok tiddeciedi x'ha tikteb, fuq xiex ghad ghandek x'taghmel, fuq xiex ha taghlaq illum, lil min ghad trid tkellem etc...

Fi kliem iehor, trid taghmel decizjonijiet fuq x'ha jinghata prijorita' u fuq x'ha jkollu jiehu back seat. Fi klima fejn giet maqtula kollega taghna, fejn il-korruzzjoni saret endemika f'kull entita' u f'kull settur, fejn suppost ghandek awtoritajiet li jtuk ir-risposti minflok jaraw x'jaghmlu biex jidfnuk bit-theddid legali, il-prijorita' unanima hija wahda. 

Li niskrutinizzaw l-operat tal-istat u li nigru wara l-istejjer li jorbtu mal-infiq ta' flus il-poplu u fuq min hu hati li wassalna f'dan il-mument fejn pajjizna huwa meqjus stat mafjuz. 

Dak li jghid il-mexxej tal-oppozizzjoni f'kuntest bhal dak, avolja jaf ikun ta' mertu u ta' certu sens jew rilevanza ta' xi tip, huwa messagg minghand bniedem li a) ghandu media house disponibbli ghal bzonnijiet tal-partit tieghu biex twassal il-messagg ad litteram, b) ghandu hafna aktar rizorsi ohrajn oltre' dak li tista toffri media house independenti biex dak il-messagg jasal (reklamar / banners / house-visits / materjal promozzjonali bhal leaflets etc...) u c) finalment huwa messagg minghand xi hadd li qieghed imexxi partit li ghandu metodologija li tistrieh fuq bias favur il-partit u kontra il-partit l-iehor.

Kull min jiehu xoghlu f'dan is-settur b'integrita u b'serjeta' jaf li l-oggettivita' ma tistriehx fuq newtralment tirraporta lil kullhadd u taghti spazju ekwu f'dak is-sens. Trid taghsar l-intenzjoni tal-messagg, trid tifhem x'qieghed jigi mmanipulat u x'inhu minnhu u vverifikat, trid tara il-piz tal-kliem fis-sitwazzjoni.

Ez.: jekk ha nitkellmu fuq kif qed jispara 'l fuq il-prezz tal-ikel jien ser naghti aktar prijorita' lil bidwi li ghandu xi jghid fuq kemm oghla l-fertiliser u l-feed tal-annimali li qieghed irabbi milli ser naghti prjiorita' lil dak li ghandu xi jghid politiku. Mhux ghax il-politiku qed nipprova ninjorah jew ninnega dak li qieghed jghid, imma ghax naf li dak il-bidwi ghandu hafna inqas reach biex jghid dak li qieghed jghaddi minnhu (plus huwa aktar rilevanti ghax fuqu niddependu) milli li ghandu xi jghid politiku li avolja jaf ikollu ideat biex insolvu l-problema ghandu poteri biex jiehu azzjoni konkreta u ghandu aktar mezzi biex iwassal l-istrategija tieghu lil votanti tieghu.

Dan huwa biss ezempju wiehed pero nahseb jiddelineja punt importanti li nhoss huwa zball strategiku enormi minn kull politiku f'dal-pajjiz. Il-poplu jivvutalkom biex tiehdu hsieb dak li qieghed jinkwetah / jispirah / jincentivah. L-azzjonijiet taghkom ghandom ikunu l-messagg taghkom. Bl-istess mod, fejn jidhol l-operat taghkom, niskrutinizzaw lilkom ukoll u fejn ikollkom jedd importanti u rwol dirett f'xi haga newsworthy, tinghataw l-ispazju xieraq, fejn l-affarijiet kollha l-ohrajn li jkunu qeghdin jigru.

Xoghol il-media huwa li jiehu nota ta kliemkom u ghemilkom u imbaghad inhallu f'idejn il-poplu jiggudikakom.

About education to move forward...
First & foremost we need to stop thinking that children need to be educated, from an ethics point of view. If we didn't have very large egos, children actually teach us, not we teach them, as children do not compromise on ethics. They are straight forward, very much like Mark, which is good! 
In general our job as parents / adults should be one that brings out the best from children, as in assist them in their dreams... They will then self learn according to what they have passion towards, by following their internal calling. Basically we need to stop shoving down information (education) which is necessarily just irrelevant information that doesn't necessarily assist to an enlightened / purposeful  life. Maybe instead of "teaching" them when they ask questions, we shall return their question with another question, to assist them to come up with their own answers. That way they learn to be critical (not believing everything they read / hear), be curious and do the most important thing for mental growth, which is asking questions to others and themselves.

Taħdita interressanti, kif ikunu dawk ma' nies li jafu l-istorja ta' Malta sew. Waqt li nifhem lil Mark meta jitkellem fuq modernizzazzjoni tal-pajjiż, ma nistax naqbel miegħu li l-Gvern taħt il-PN ma għamel xejn biex jimmodernizza. Forsi Mark qal hekk għax ma għex iż-żmien biex jara t-tibdil kbir li sar fi żmien qasir (kien għadu jitwieled). Imma bħala storiku suppost jista' jieqaf janalizza. 
(Hawn fejn naqbel mal-kumment ta' Karl Serracino.) 

Tajjeb li rraġuna li lanqas Joseph Muscat ma ħadem biex jimmodernizza - anzi b'mod anti-soċjalist, kabbar faqar relattiva. U tajjeb ukoll nirrikonuxxu li d-demografika tal-votanti inbidlet (fejn naraw in-numri?). 

Malta pajjiż b'area żgħira, iżgħar minn belt f'pajjiżi oħrajn. Imissha tkun fl-aqwa stat, standards għoljin f'servizzi, proċessi u ambjent.

I consider Mr Mark Camilleri of a higher than average intelligence.  However, it is funny - or maybe tragic - how socialists choose to remember what is more convenient.  Mr Camilleri mentions the corruption under EFA and under Gonzi, but refers to the corruption of Lorry Sant, yet no corruption under Mintoff.  Under Mr Camilleri’s Hero, Dom Mintoff, bullying, corruption, political murders took a turn for the worse.  I know - I lived those times.  I worked for people whose business was almost destroyed thanks to Mintoff’s “policies”.  Dom Mintoff managed to isolate us from Europe and the West.  His economic growth was obtained mainly by blackmailing other nations and reduced the country spending not by improving the country’s output, but by getting sponsored work from China.  Alfred Sant’s “Svizzera fil-Mediterran” would have been a great idea, had it come 20 years before!!  Mintoff did lots of good - giving rights to previously emarginated groups, made education and health available to everyone.  But, at some point in time, thought that a smart nation is not good for him and his regime.  Means of communication were limited and controlled and his opposers were getting persecuted.  In 1987, our country could not grow because it lacked the infrastructure to power the industry and the means of communication was still primitive.  All this in the eve of the IT revolution.  Malta could have become a financial centre in the Mediterranean had it got the right strategy in the 1970s (after consolidating the country following the Independence and Republic).  We missed the train.  Big time.  For a country with limited natural resources, that was - and remains - our only option.  Under Mintoff, corruption escalated, went under control but escalated again under the Pn, only to be taken to stratospheric levels under the “New Labour”.  But most people fail to see our story in an objective way.  My “socialist” wokmates are under the impression that divorce legislation was introduced under Joseph Muscat Government...and we are not talking of 50 years ago!  Mr Camilleri fails to also mention how the last PN legislation’s failure to get people on board with its strategy, resulted in opposition and lack of cooperation on many levels.  Corruption? Yes, but blaming the current levels on the PN?  No, blame it on the people who fail and do not want to learn.

Regarding the erga omnes rule. RM's argument is absolute hogwash. 1. Theres a zillion individuals which are not elected to parliament that are constantly legislating under the ministry's authority or other institutions like the MFSA through subsidiary legislation and other minor statutory law which is not promulgated by parliament. 2. The erga omnes rule FORCES the government to RELEGISLATE if the law is unconstitutional - basically the courts are saying "you fucked up bro, try again". The argument ax which is the right judgement etc is nonsense. I's just another excuse to allow the government absolute legislative power. The rules on separation of power was never conceived to be absolutely air tight. Prevent the constitutional court from removing a law is something that severely weakening the institution and the philosophical / democratic underpinning of the country. By RM's argument if tomorrow parliament passed a law where concentration camps were legal - strictly speak it would be because the process would have been followed. And then if the constitutional court would declare it illegal because its inconsistent with the constitutions (i.e. our heighest principles) then we'll all just get the comfort of knowing its wrong, but until the government actually removes it, it'll stay there. Now get what I just said, and imagine that happening in a fascist state, u know, one comes to mind that did they greatest atrocities of the 20th century. Most imp everything they did was "legal". We live in a society where law is lawless. Fuck these assholes

ECJ: Musumeci has no logical tenure in this regard. He cannot conclude a posteriori that the change was not needed. As the saying goes, with hindisght we are all geniuses. We had an absolute mechanism; pressure by Opposition was made; Venice commission agreed; here the timeline splits - a)the Gov is 'thinking' about it; decides to cave in to the Comm's recommendations before hearing the ruling of the ECJ; b)Repubblika opens a case with the ECJ; the ECJ rules that the previous mechanism did not fundamentally break any rights of rule. One cannot say that it was not needed just because he now knows the answer. I'd rather say that it was a Political move ie Gov and friends somehow knew that listening or not will not make a difference and so allowed to make the change, to make future leverage.

Xi dwejjaq ta' bniedem u sfortunatament ta' podcast (mhux tort ta' Jon). Allahares kelna nuzaw biss ic-certezza legali biex niggudikaw u naslu ghal-konkluzonijiet fuq il-politikanti u dawk li jservuna fis-servizzi publicci. Ic-certezza legali huwa kejl oneruz wisq, u ghalhekk facli biex ma jintlahaqx jekk dak huwa l-iskop ta' min ma jixtieqx jinqabad. Jevita li jsemmi ismijiet, anki jekk dawk imsemmija (perezempju Silvio Valletta) diga gew ikkastigati minn dan l-istess gvern. Avukat li ma jifhimx xinhi 'separation of powers' u jrid legislatur bla limitu/razan.  Dan il-bniedem huwa xejn iktar minn serp velenuz u perikoluz. Public enemy.

Jekk il-poplu taghna qed jghazel politici li lanqas ghandhom il-bajd li jammettu li l-ghazla ta Hitler kien zball kolossali u inuman, mela tabilhaqq haqqna lil nindifnu taht il-konkos u r-rebgha. Tal-biki, l-inkapacita ta dawn in-nies li jammettu li saru zbalji kbar taht dan il-gvern. L-importanti li naqalaw lira malajr, li n-nies jghidulna "Proset ministru, 40k", li nibqaw lejali lejn il-klikka u mhux il-pajjiz fil-waqt li ninhbew wara li zbalji li ghamlu ta qabilna. Zomm l-poplu hmar, halli iddendel il-karotta u jimxi fejn trid, sa dan it-tant min qied fuq il-karru jibqa jiffanga u jahxi, waqt li l-hmar igorr il-piz u l-konsegwenzi.

Il- knisja halaqha Kristu (perfetta) imma imexxiha il- bniedem (imperfett),
Jon in- nies ghandhom bzonn super eroj. Min jemmen (FIDI) u min jara fittizju (Marvel/DC comics/gvernijiet). Il- fidi ma hix xjenza u provi. Il- fidi tghix u temmen anke li ma jmiss mas- sensi, ikun hemm drabi li tiddubita imma wahdek tasal fi zmien fejn tistaqsi b'mod razzjonali u temmen jew le, imqar fl- ahhar ta'hajjtek. Prosit! Naqbel ma Mark f'kollox pero ghalija jizloq meta jitkellem fuq ir religjon.
 1) Li jghid li d-demokrazija vvintata l-knisja ma nafx mimm fej gabha meta nafu li din ila tezisti fil-grecja antika meta kienu ghadhom jemmnu b' zeus u poseidon.

2) Il-valuri m ' hux gejjin mil-knisja. Il-valuri gejjin mil-miljuni ta' snin ta evoluzzjoni fejn skoprejna li huwa ta' vantagg li ma toqtolx lil gar tieghek biex dan ma jaghmilx l -istess lilek. Il-knisja serqithom u ghamilthom taghha.

3) Meta tghid li m'ghandekx evidenza ghed turi li l-argument hu fazull. Mela nitolbu l-evidenza ghal kull argument pero ma nitolbuwiex meta jidhol religjon. Ma taghmilx sens iktar u iktar meta ssemmi l- fidi. Faith is the death of reason u m ' ghandna nuzawha qatt.

Great respect goes towards individuals that do not want to hear anything about politics. Most of these people have realised that all they need to change is themselves and not the world, therefore they do not need a leader to lead them or a hero to change the world. If everyone thinks like so the world will be a much more beautiful place. When one tries changing the world there will always be people that resent those conditions because we are human. We do not like others telling us what to do. This is why the world never heals and is always divided. Deep down we all know what is right or wrong from the day of birth. In truth it's very simple to know right from wrong. It's just that money and survival instincts lead us to doing things we do not want and makes life complicated, with a lot of compromises of right vs wrong.

Is-Soċjaliżmu falla kull fejn ġie pruvat. F' Malta u f'pajjiżi oħra hemm l-idea żbaljata li s-Soċjaliżmu huwa favur il-fqir. Iżda x'jiġri meta l-fqir ma jibqax fqir ? Din hi t-tweġiba li s-Soċjaliżmu qatt ma kien kapaċi jwieġeb u dawk li jgħidu li huma Soċjalisti jibqgħu jippretenduha ta' foqra jew jużaw dik il-kelma tant abbużata fil-vokabolarju Malti u jirreferu għalihom bħala 'ż-żgħir' anki meta ma jkunu 'żgħar' xejn. Il-verita' hi li s-Soċjaliżmu jinkoraġixxi l-għażż u d-dipendenza ta' ħafna ċittadini fuq il-gvern. Fis-Soċjaliżmu l-gvern isir l-ALLA falz il-ġdid li jrid kontrol ta' kollox u huwa għalhekk li min jgħid li hu Soċjalist isibha daqshekk diffiċli li jieħu krirtika jew li jikkritika lil gvern jew lil Partit tiegħu. Is-Soċjaliżmu jaħdem biss bħala sangwisuga fuq in-nies kapaċi li jieħdu r-riskju u jiftħu l-ażjendi u l-fabbriki li jiġġeneraw il-flus li jħallsu t-taxxi. Imbagħad meta nies anqas kapaċi, anqas bieżgħla u li ma jieħdux riskji jaraw lil dawk kapaċi  javvanzaw aktar minnhom dawn jgħiru u jkunu jriedu l-istess kwalita' tal-ħajja li huma la ħadmu għaliha u lanqas jkun ħaqqhom. L-idea stess ta' ugwaljanza hija idea impossibli għax in-nies m'għandhomx l-istess kapaċitajiet mentali u fiżiċi u ma jieħdux l-istess deċiżjonijiet f'ħajjithom u lanqas jitwieldu fl-istess ċirkostanzi familjari jew jgħixu l-istess ammont ta' snin. Per eżempju għaliex bniedem sakranazz jew drogat jew li jilgħabhom  għandu jippretendi li jkollu l-istess kwalita' ta' ħajja ta' bniedem li rari jixrob, qatt ma ħa droga u li ma jilgħabx il-flus u li minflok jkun mikul mill-vizzji jinvesti flusu fix-xogħol tiegħu, fit-taħriġ kontinwu jew fil-business tiegħu ? Jew inkella għaliex xi ħadd ta' erbatax il-sena joqgħod idur bir-rota u jittanata u jinnamra u ma jistudja xejn għandu jippretendi li jaqla' l-istess ammont meta jikber ta' xi ħadd li baqa' l-skola u qatta' ħinu jistudja u jistinka biex ikollu job tajjjeb forsi aħjar milli kellu missieru ? Jew għaliex mara li jkollha t-tfal qabel iż-żwieġ għandha tippretendi li jkun il-gvern li jħallas għall-uliedha għax imbagħad tkun trid li uliedha jkunu bħal tal-oħrajn imma hi jmissha ħasbitha qabel u provdiet lil uliedha b'missier u mhux tpoġġi l-karru qabel iż-żiemel ? Sfortunatament illum minħabba s-Soċjaliżmu n-nies għażżiena, li ma jistudjawx, is-single mothers, in-nies sakranazzi, id-drogati, in-nies bla ħeġġa dejjem qed jiżdidedu u l-Partiti biex ma jitifux il-vot ta' dawn in-nies minflok jikkritikaw lil dawn in-nies li bid-deċiżjonijiet ħżiena tagħhom qed ikunu piż fuq is-soċjeta', joffrulhom u jwiegħduhom aktar servizzi u jżiedu f'dawn in-nies is-sens ta' 'entitlement' u jnaqqsu l-inizjativa biex dawn in-nies jinbiddlu jew biex oħrajn ma jagħmlux bħalhom.

Il- kelma socjalizmu ghalija tfisser ugwaljanza u drittijiet ghal haddiem, minghajr abbuz ta' l-istess drittijiet, sforz kollettiv, unjoni ghal gid komuni. Filwaqt li nemmen b'sahha f'din l- ideologija zgur li bhalissa mhux naraha ssehh. Forsi qed isiru tentattivi biex jizdiedu l- flus fil- but, imma allura l- gid komuni jghodd biss kemm ghandek flus? Kemm ghandna ambjent b'sahhtu biex inkunu b'sahhitna mhux ukoll imprtanti? U kif ma nistax ngharaf b'mod car partit politiku li jiehu hsieb genwinament dan il- fattur importanti?

U bilhaqq socjalisti zgur li m'hawnx imexxu; tixba tisma' b' relazzjonijiet ta' kull tip ma' kull kuntrattur u mega negozjanti haxxejja li hawn fuq wicc din l- art suppost helwa. Hmieg. Dawn l- affarijiet anqas jittwemnu! Id- distakk ta' bejn is- sinjur u z- zghir dejjem tikber. Billi ghandek karozza sabiha kollha dejn ma jfissirx li sirt sinjur. Il- hajja kuntenta tigbor hafna affarijiet mhux gid materjali biss!!

Zammit Lewis parti mill- klikka, kif jixhdu il- messaggi, ghaqda/xirka jghixu komdi minn fuq dahar il- poplu mghomi bic- cejca li jwaddbulu waqt li huma jithanzru. X'ma jghidulnix l- Inglizi naghag ta' Bendu. Mentalita tal- merhla. "Prosit ministru" u nammiraw il- haxi tal- mexxejja ghad- detriment tal- haddiem, minflok nghidulu "Ghamel xoghlok sewwa ghax indabbrulek rasek". Tal- biki....Juan Mamo ghejja jitqalleb fil- qabar.

Nhoss li socjalizmu jista jahdem (specjalment bhal ta Norvegja), imma mux fil Partit Laburista kurrenti ta' Malta. Ma hemm l-ebda hil ta ideolgija fil qucata tal partit. Nhobb nqabel il PL ta Malta issa al labour party tal ingilterra meta tela Gordon Brown(Abela) wara id disuluzjoni ta Blair(Muscat). L-unika haga li qed jmexi il moral tal PL bhallissa huwa biex jaraw kif jista jigranfaw ma kul vot biex jibqaw fil poter. Hasra kbira ax saru passi kbar socjali il quddiem f dan il perjodu, imma il prezz kien qares wisq. Ma nistawx nacettaw li l pajiz jigi mmexi min gvern li tahtu saru dal atrocitajiet.

Interestingly conciousness can be controlled - in the sense - biologically - fil mohh emm site specifica jisima ir Reticular Actication system ( a group of neurons ) which is attributed to conciousness. Wara li segwejt dan l-episodju, l-iktar haga li baqghet iddur f'mohhi hija paragun bejn gruppi bhar-River of Love u l-famuzi 'flat earthers'. Niftakarni nara dokumentarju fuqhom u l-iktar haga li gibditli l-attenzjoni kienet il-mod kif tefaw il-karru qabel iz-ziemel i.e.: waslu ghal konkluzjoni li d-dinja hija catta u imbaghad pruvaw juzaw metodi xjentifici u evidenza li jfittxu biex jivverifikaw il-konkluzjoni taghhom. Dan, ovvjament, huwa l-kontra ta dak li jirrikjedi l-metodu xjentifiku, voldiri li tanalizza l-evidenza li hemm quddiemek imbaghad tipprova twassal ghal konkluzjonijiet.

L-istess jaghmlu l-entitatjiet religjuzi bhal dawk li jirraprezenta Matthew. F'din il-podcast, il-konkluzjonijiet li wasal ghalihom kienu kollha gejjin minn dal-bzonn ovvju li jsib mod kif ikisser l-ansjeta' kollha li kien hemm rigward l-orjentazzjoni sesswali tieghu (mit-tfajliet tal-iskola, sal-genituri, sal-gudikament tieghu stess fuqu nnifsu li imbaghad sab kunflitt mal-valuri Kristjani li tawh is-sens ta' komunita' li s-socjeta' infantili taghna cahditu minnha ghax twieled differenti). Fi ftit kliem, Matthew kellu bzonn jichad bicca krucjali minnu nnifsu biex jiskarta l-biza' li jaffacjaha, u bena l-belief system tieghu dwar dan.

Il-mental athletics li jwassluk ghal konkluzjonijiet bhal ta' Matthew huma xorta wahda hafna ehfef milli jkollok taffacja l-biza' li inti 'differenti', li inti migbud lejn is-sess tieghek stess u avolja kapaci tkun realta' tal-biza' u oskura, hija realta' li trid taccetta u anzi tgawdi avolja l-kurrent ta' madwarek jaf jopponiha. Bhal flat earthers, Matthew strah fuq l-istejjer allegorici tal-Bibbja bhala l-verita' ahharija u tefa l-karru qabel iz-ziemel. 'Il-ktieb jghid li tkun omosesswali m'hijiex naturali, mela ser insib studju specifiku minn Science Mag li nista' nuza biex nghid li l-orjentazzjoni sesswali hija parzjalment ibbazata fuq il-genetika u l-bqija social conditioning li nista' nibdel, etc...'

It-testi sagrosanti tar-religjonijiet huma kollezzjonijiet ta' stejjer, gherf u hsibijiet li kienu intenzjonati biex joholqu gwida li tikkonsulta biex inti tghix hajja gusta. Ma sarux biex jigu cherry-picked skont il-bzonn tal-qarrej biex jiggustifika decizjonijiet ibbazati fuq 'mental renewal' = repeated self-denial. Pero, bl-istess mod li ma ssegwix mappa antikwata sal-ahhar linja ghax jaf twasslek fi triq li m'ghadiex tezisti, l-istess m'ghandniex insegwu kliem li nkiteb ghal zmien iehor minn nies ohrajn sal-inqas ittra.

By the way, id-dokumentarju fuq il-flat earthers (spoiler alert) jispicca billi joholqu esperiment li, meta jezegwixxuh, juri bic-car li d-dinja hija, in fatti, sferika. Fil-kaz ta' Matthew, li qieghed jibbaza hajtu fuq direzzjoni spiritwali, hija itqal biex tiddetermina dak li qieghed jinghad huwiex minnu jew le, specjalment meta tobrox il-qiegh tal-borma wara tlett sieghat podcast biex tasal ghal konkluzjoni ta' 'Alla huwa akbar minn dak li tista tifhem' u 'trid temmen lili, jien li cert li ghandi ragun ghax hekk nemmen u jien msalva u intom le ghax ghadkom ghall-infern'.

Komdi kemm huma komdi l-konkluzjonijiet li tkun wasalt ghalihom ghal gid tieghek innifsek, finalment ir-realta' hemm tibqa, tichada kemm tichada. Irgiel li huma omosesswali u jmorru ghat-'terapija' tal-konverzjoni biex isalvaw iz-zwieg mal-mara taghhom jistghu jaghmlu mental renewal kemm iridu, ghax jekk m'hemmx attraction ghal ragunijiet ovvji qieghed tichad istint u bzonn baziku li dejjem ha jaghmlek infelici b'mod subkonxju. 

Ir-realta' f'dak il-kaz tiddetta li jekk ir-ragel (jew anke l-mara ma' mara ohra, ovvjament) f'zwieg eterosesswali huwa mdejjaq ghax jixtieq jaqsam dik l-esperjenza ma' persuna ohra tal-istess sess. Li jibqghu flimkien ghax xi hadd 'ikkonverta' m'hija xejn hlief denial tal-holqien u perverzjoni tal-felicita' li seta kien hemm. 

Rant twila hafna, pero' nahseb tahfruli meta tqis it-tul tal-podcast. Matthew carament huwa bniedem intelligenti li rnexxielu jibni labyrinth infinit ta' argumenti li jsawru l-gagga li bena ghalih innifsu. Nemmen li kullhadd ghandu bzonn is-serhan ta' komunita' li thobb bla kundizzjonijiet u nittama li jsib dak li qieghed ifittex 'il barra minn mindset li twasslu li jinnega dak li hu, hu x'inhu, minghajr l-indhil ta' nies li jghidu li jlissnu l-kelma t'Alla izda juzawha biss biex jimmanipulaw il-biza' ghal skopijiet ta' gwadann.

Puntata ohra tajba w interessanti. Julian jixraqlu tifhir li qasam maghna storja xejn komuni. Min bhalu ghadda min esperjenzi simili, jaf li huma mumenti partikolari li jhallu marka permanenti. Pero..., nahseb li l-mod kif iggudika l-esperjenza fid-Dar ta' San Guzepp kienet negattivament sproporzjonata u certament, mhux fair. Mhux qed nghid li l-esperjenzi li semma ma grawx realment, ghaliex xi stejjer kienu ritratti ezatti tal-fatti, pero kienu pogguti f'kuntest aljen, b'doza ta' pregudizzju u rabja. Nifhem li fil-hajja jkollna esperjenzi jew persuni li nistaw inhobbu jew nobghodu. Jidher li Julian ma kellux grazzja ma' dan il-lok partikolari, li kif qal hu, kien joffri kontinwazzjoni ta' dak li beda fi Fra Diegu. Dan jikkonfermah meta fahhar tant l-ambjent ta' Saint Patrick, li dejjem kellu medadologija opposta ta' kif jitmexxa u l-ambjent hu differenti. Pero ghal bosta ohrajn, id-Dar ta' San Guzepp kienet esperjenza pozittiva.

Ma stajtx nifhem kif Julian mar fid-Dar ta' San Guzepp meta kellu 8 snin, meta jidhirli li fl-ahhar 50 sena kienu jaccettaw tfal li jkollhom 10 snin jew aktar. Kellu wkoll l-isfortuna li sab deskrepanza kbira fl-etajiet, xi haga li zgur ma tghinx fl-izvulupp tat-tfal f'ambjent bhal dan. Zgur li kien hemm element partikolari li kien kuntrastanti bejn San Guzepp u St. Patrick's, li hi d-dixxiplina. Karattru bhal ta' Julian, ma kien sa jiffitja qatt fl-ambjent ta' San Guzepp. Nifhmu! Ma stajtx nifhem ukoll dak li ntqal dwar il-carers, ghaliex fi zmienu fid-Dar ta' San Guzepp kien hemm bosta carers li jaqsmu l-hidma mar-religjuzi MSSP. 

Kollox ma kollox, l-esperjenza ta' Julian hi t'ispirazzjoni ghal hafna u turi li b'kuragg u determinazzjoni, wiehed jista jitrasforma bosta sfortuni tal-hajja, fi storja ta' success.
