This was an amazing podcast, but I'm confused with Mark's views on British Malta vs the Knights.   Any empire will put its own interests first, but that doesn't mean that there cannot be situations where the interests of the coloniser and colonised are aligned.   As their contemporaries, the British committed numerous atrocities across their Empire, some down to incompetence, some for self-serving reasons, but an objective view should lay out the good and the bad for all to see.

As Mark C says, many jobs left with the knights, but whole new sectors opened overnight as one would expect being a port within a seafaring empire,  leading to huge demand for new skills, for which the British empire funded schooling and education to build a new skilled workforce.   Yes, it was largely a service industry (shipbuilding, repair, etc) and not producing goods, and largely  state-driven.   Nonetheless,  the British in Malta provided continuity from the Knights in terms of national infrastructure, significantly extending public sanitation, public health and charities for the poor and infirm.  Yes, they granted far too much power to local elites and appeased the church, however they also provided a social mobility largely impossible under the knights. 

Maltese historians have made a living trying to imitate post-colonial scholars of British India and the middle east, regions with vastly differing experiences and identities.  This along with political reasons has led them to push forward this simplistic narrative of the evil British empire against the poor hard-working Maltese, while at the same time fetishising the Knights rule, or even weirder the Napoleonic rule (as if Egypt and Algeria weren't disaster enough).  Perhaps it's time to stop fellating Hegel and Edward Said and start looking at actual data.   I recommend reading the works of the tiny handful of Maltese academics who have provided a balanced (and peer reviewed) view of Malta's economy, infrastructure and welfare under the British empire,  unfortunately none of them actually based in Malta.

Il-kolonjalist dejjem ħaseb għal rasu, biss li tgħid li taħt il-Kavallieri konna aħjar hi ħaġa li ma nista' nifhem b'xejn. Tassew għalihom dan kien pajjiżhom, forsi l-ewwel difett li jikxef ħafna fl-argument bażwi. Tagħhom u mhux tagħna, imma x'tistenna minn wieħed li għalieħ 'Tagħna lkoll' tfisser tagħhom biss! Il-kavallieri (li ma kienux sinjuri imma nobbli bil-pedigree) ħallew lill-pajjiż fil-medjuevu, għadna niġġieldu l-kruċjati sa ma wasal Napuljun, b'ekonomija tiddependi fuq il-Corso u l-bejgħ ta' merkanzija misruqa u t-traffikar ta' l-ilsiera. Immqa x'tistenna minn bniedem li għalieħ aħjar li l-pajjiż jistagħna bil-ħasil tal-flus, it-traffikar internazzjonali ta' xogħol prekarju u d-degard ta' l-ambjet f'kull qasam? L-Ingliżi tassew li ħasbu għal rashom, bħalma jgħamel kulħadd (inkluż is-Sur Mark) imma daħħlu sistemi li fl-aħħar mill-aħħar wasslu biex sirna nazzjon, bażwi kemm trid (minħabba l-mentalita' tal nies bħalu) imma nazzjoni imsejjes fuq id-demokrazija Ingliża. Ma kont nistenna xejn aħjar kieku baqgħu il-Franċiżi, biżżejjed wieħed iħares lejn x'ġara l-Alġerija, per eżempju. Jien ngħid li inzertajna l-aqwa alternattiva li setgħet taqa' f'ħoġorna u li s'intendi kienet titlob li ngħamlu daqsxejn ta' sforz aħna wkoll biex intejjbu l-ħajja tagħna. Jekk tħares lejn x'kien qed jiġri fil-punent dak iż-żmien tifhem li l-Maltin ma kienux f'xi qagħada agħar minn ħaddieħor, saħansitra l-Ingliżi stess. Is-soċjeta' minn dejjem kienet, għadha u tibqa' maqsuma fi klassijiet. Min imexxi, min jeherda u minn jobdi u jintredha u Maltqa hekk kienu u għadhom l-affarijiet. Jekk irridu nqabblu, aħjar naraw x'ġara lill dal-pajjiż mill-Indipendenza 'l hawn u nintebħu li, l-aktar taħt il-Labour, ġibnieħ mandra u tbedna ferm mill-prinċipji ta' demokrazija, sistemi parlamentari, gudikatura, etika u dixxiplina li, malgre' lui, ħallew warajhom l-Ingliżi. u aparti hekk ma nistax nifhem dan l-ghageb ax ha jkun hemm kwota an-nisa fil-parlament...its not like the men already there are doing such a fantastic job anyway.

I suggest you pick this topic from another angle. Ask the relevance of a quota to a woman. 

How can parliament enact laws that will effect women when women are not being represented on the discussion table. Firms that have female executives perform better (https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.bbc.com/news/business-53548704.amp). Should we want our parliament to perform at its best?

I do agree that without proper representation on the ballot sheets we cannot expect people to vote for women.  

Is parliamentary work and parliamentary sessions family friendly? We are living in an era where we have family friendly measures (sometimes) but women are still expected to carry most of the burden of raising a family. How is this impacting their careers? Gender pay-gap? 

We might give every opportunity to women to be elected on paper but we have not discussed what challenges they face just to get considered for the job. 

Then there is the personal scrutiny of being in the public life but more so for women.  One is judged for doing too much or too little make-up, the length of their skirt, their dress sense, the hair do, you name it... do men really go through all this?  Who in the right mind would want this?  

Women in politics are brave. I applaud all of them for their courage and determination.

Li qed jgħid Kenneth Bone huwa minnu imma mhux qed jgħid kollox lanqas. Il-fatt hu li fil-familja Maltija hija l-mara li hija mistennija li tissaggrifika l-karriera biex tinbena familja. Għalhekk għandna din is-sitwazzjoni ta' żbilanċ fil-qligħ bejn in-nisa u l-irġiel. Din mhix kwistjoni ta' mara titħallas inqas minn raġel għall-istess xogħol. Apparti l-fatt, u dan mhux f'Malta biss li ħafna xogħol fid-dar isir mill-mara u dan isir mingħajr ħlas. Ħafna nisa jissagrifikaw ħafna biex itellgħu familja u meta jqumu l-intoppi jibqgħu kważi lampa stampa. Fil-pajjiżi fejn hemm inqas żbilanċ bejn in-nisa u l-irġiel bħal fil-pajjiżi Skandinavi, hemm ħafna aktar bilanċ fix-xogħol tad-dar bejn iż-żewġ sessi. Il-parental leave jingħata kemm lill-omm u kemm lill-missier bir-riżultat li t-tnejn jieqfu l-istess u r-raġel jkollu wkoll l-opportunità li jibni rapport ma' wliedu, xi ħaġa li f'ħafna pajjiżi patrijarkali bħal Malta din hi nieqsa ħafna. Il-patrijarkaliżmu jweġġa' anki lill-irġiel stess.

Xi haga ohra marbuta man- nisa fil politika; minkejja li f'dinja ideali, inkun naqbel iktar ma Kenneth, apparti dak li hemm f mohhok u l kapacita tieghek, irridu ukoll inzommu f mohna li iktar ma jkun varjat il parlament, mhux fil konfront ta generu biss imma f hafna aspetti ohra, iktar se jkun hemm diversita fil -hsieb. Ezempju li forsi nista' insemmi hu li hafna irgiel mhux se qatt jifhmu l-esperjenzi li nghaddu minnhom ahna n-nisa. F'certi legizlazzjonijiet, specjalment dawk li jolqtu hafna lilna kemm direttament habba l-generu jew is-sess taghna, kif ukoll jekk jolqtuna b'mod indirettament, mhux se nkunu raprezentati kompletament sew gahx forsi certu irgiel ma jiguhomx f'mohhom jahsbu f'certu affarijiet minhabba n-nuqqas t'esperjenza personali. Allura ghandha tkun ta prijorita li jkollna kemm jista jkun parliament li jirraprezenta l-poplu malti kollu. Naqbel hafna li il-kapacita tal-individwu ghandha tmur l-ewwel u qabel kollox, izda li naccettaw li  kwalunkwe differenza socjali li ghandna u l-mod kif titrattana s-socjeta habba fihom se jaghmluna differenti ghandna tkun a close second.Fl-opinjoni tieghi l-gender quota qed tipprova ssolvi problema li mhux qieghda hemm; li l-Maltin jivvutaw b'mod sessist, meta ahjar naghmlu xi haga i ssolvi l-problema attwali u dik hi; ghala hawn hafna kandidati irgiel, t'eta simili, tal-istess razza bi presso poco l-istess esperjenza fil-hajja.? Qed naghmlu xi haga bhala votant biex nimbuttaw lil nies li ma jaqawx f'dil-katergorija? Jew ix-xena politika Maltija ma tippermettix dan nies beix jidhlu fiha facilment?

Partiti dejjem ibbenefikaw mit-tribalizmu u nuqqas ta edukazzjoni fost il-poplu, jidispjanicini nghid b`mod specjali il-partit Laburista. Dan ta` l-ahhar dejjem prova izomm il-bulk demographic ta voter tijaw injorant u jifhem hafna ahjar u jihu vantagg taghha hafna aktar mil-partit nazzjonalista. Din il-haga hija li vott huwa vott. Jhekk kellna nikwantifikaw il-vote acquisition u retention il-Partit laburista specjalment fl-ahhar snin kien hafna ahjar mil PN ghaliex alloka rizorsi tieghu hafna ahjar f`dan ir-rigward. Ezempju partit x jaqbillu, (ha nkunu straight u mhux ha niprova naghmila tal politically correct) li juza "X' amount of resources biex jakwista vot wiehed li gej mighand tabbib/avukat/Tertiary educated person jew tuza 'X' biex tigbed 3-4 persuni li ghandom xorti lestaw sekondarja u li kapaci tixijom b xi flixkun inbid jew rolypoly (affarijiet li rajna), fl-ahhar min l-ahhar vott huwa vott. Dan narawh ukoll fis-sub sectors tal-partiti. Filwaqt li fil PN wiehed jista jghid li fih bosta, ezempju nies ta south, ta sliema, NGOs bhal repubblika u CSN, etc. etc. il-PL huwa hafna aktar efficjenti li jzomm il-partitarji kolla taht kappa wahda and they toe the party line. Realta ohra li tkompli tissoda dal-punt huwa li kull darba li xi hadd jiprova jigbed attenjoni ghal din issue jigi mal-ewwel identifikat bhala elitista u snob. Ikun hafna ahjar ghal poplu jhekk ma nivutawx ghal wicc jew ghal kulur imma nivutaw biss purament on policy.

Dil- bicca tal- podcast laqtitni immens u gieghlitni immur infittex fuq dak li ghidtu. Partikolarment laqatni il- kuncett ta' Amoral Familialism. Qrajt aktar fuqu u f' daqqa wahda, qed inhossni nifhem hafna aktar il- psikologija kollettiva (kultura?) Maltija.

L- osservazzjoni li ghamel Dr. Bell (wiehed mill- aqwa letturi li kelli) dwar id- differenza bejn l- Italja tan north u tas- south nista nikkonfermaha first-hand. Fi zmien li ghamilt nghix l- Italja, donnu bhal magija, kont ningwalaha mill- ewwel ma nies li gejjin mis- South (jew nies li d- dixxendendi taghhom huma mis- South). Uhud minnhom filfatt laqawni daqs li kieku familja, allovalja jien Malti.

X' naqbad nghid... Podcast tajjeb immens. Keep it up.

Punti selettivi ghaddejin minn mohhi:

Hadt pjacir nisma' li mhux jien biss inhobb b'sahha lill- Ingilterra, ghax iva fejn marru l- Inglizi aktar sar gid milli deni. Ghal hafna pajjizi l- Ingilterra kienet, u fil- fatt ghadha ispirazzjoni. Bosta pajjizi minn fejnu telqu l- Ingilterra marru ghal aghar. Thares lejn il- Union Jack, tifhem x'tirraprezenta, u timmeravilja ruhek x'aghmel dan il- pajjiz matul is- snin. Iva meta nisma' l- innijiet nazzjonali ta' Malta u l- Ingilterra inhoss emozzjonijiet kbar. 

Hawn Malta iva hawn kolonnji mahluqa minn nies, Maltin bhali, li ghax ghandhom il- flus u poter hakmu lill din l- art.

Niehu gost hafna nisma' lil missierek jitkellem Jon, pero' ghandu certu riservi fuq hafna affarijiet li let's face it kieku ma kienx ghalihom, mhux qed ingwadu wahda mill-izjed ekonomiji b'sahhithom fl-EU. Grazzi ghal din l-iskema hafna imprendituri minn pajjizi li ejja nsejjhulhom tat-tielet dinja, dahlu fis-suq Ewropew li joffri rati u tariffi ferm izjed vantaggjuzi minn dawk ta' pajjizhom. Salvu jrid iqis il-fatt ukoll li m'ahniex l-unika pajjiz fl-Ewropa li ghandna din it-tip ta' skema, qed jiguni f'mohhi, Portugall, Lussemburgu u izjed pajjizi. Jien ma naqbilx li hija xi haga hazina, anzi pjuttost jaf tghinna nimxu u nemancipaw maz-zmien, fil-verita l-istorja Maltija dejjem il-barrani mexxiha 'il quddiem, sahansitra dejjem konna pajjiz okkupat, u il-mentalita' kolonjali li inabitat f'mohhna sfortunatament izzommna fil-qilla tar-rigress. 

Keep it up, j'Alla tirnexxi f'dawn il-podcasts, forsi thabbatha u jkunu tal-ostja daqs ta Joe Rogan :D

Alfejn qed nisrqu taxxi misthoqa min pajizi bili nitrataw kumpaniji hawn bis skema ta tax avoidance. Nistaw f' dal pajizz nsibu industrji li huma ta beneficju as socjeta in komuni. Nistaw nisbu mod valida kif namlu flus, mux dejjem irid naraw kif se ngahguwa b xi get-rich-quick scheme bhal bejh tal passaporti? Dan kollha qed jwaqaw l isem ta' Malta bil mod il mod.
